effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to begin a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of Overpower by 5%, stacking up to 10 times. 
Overpower has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends you gain 2% Haste and your Mortal Strike and Cleave damage is increased by 2% per stack of Winning Streak! you had for 12 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 3,808 or your lowest secondary stat by 4,804 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,477 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 3,996 to 4,884 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 4,884 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
